item.title: AI, AGI, and the Future: Insights from the Last Two Weeks
item.description: I’m going to share some incredible insights I’ve come across in the past two weeks.

item.title: About
item.description:
If you’re currently building in AI and find my experience relevant, ping me in any of my socials.

For the past year, I’ve been training AI models, bechnmarking and testing their strengths and weaknesses. This has been a keen hobby. Probably I’ll turn of them into a product these days.

item.title: Library
item.description:
What to do with your life
Take 15 minutes to think about what you otherwise probably won’t.
